li.a: Bruce Red Raider Nordic Ski Team

div.strong:
Santa's Helpers are now taking donations for the Annual Children's Holiday Gift Shop set for December 18th.
Donations can be brought to Mary Arts home at 1138 N 2nd St. in Bruce or to Gayle Brainerd's home at
N6009 Hwy 40 Bruce.
If you have questions please call Mary at 715-868-6201 or Gayle at 715-868-8804.
Money or gift donations are both welcome.

strong.a: Click Here for Important Information from Athletic Director

div.strong:
Students and families, please contact Melissa Detlaff with any problems or concerns
email: mdetlaff@bruce.k12.wi.us
phone: 507-858-4030

a.b:
Have you noticed a problem or witnessed bullying?
Please report it and you can remain anonymous.

div.div:
The Bruce School District strives to create a collaborative learning community focused on results promoting student success.
The Bruce School District provides a student-centered environment with dynamic educational opportunities in an ever-changing world.
